channel.title: Comments on: How To Sleep More Effectively
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
I once thought about getting a Sleep Tracker (I wrote a little about it once: /old-blog/?p=47 ), but I thought waiting for reviews and maybe for the second version would be better.
Also, I'm pretty satisfied with my current sleeping habits, so no need for the Sleep Tracker right now :)
item.content:encoded:
I once thought about getting a Sleep Tracker (I wrote a little about it once: /old-blog/?p=47 ), but I thought waiting for reviews and maybe for the second version would be better.

Also, I’m pretty satisfied with my current sleeping habits, so no need for the Sleep Tracker right now :)
